title: do check this post... any possibility of classes starting before this for pessat kids?

comments.body:
No
Pessat round 2 is only held with/after round one of kcet 

And orientation happens like a week after second round of counselling 
And classes start after one week of bootstrap
that sounds like it will be october by the time classes start lol
I still think orientation will be on aug 26th/27th and classes start sept 1st week but you do you
The later the classes the less holidays and less half days you guys get
same here. i just want more holidays when i can have it. not bothered whether i get less holidays and less half days

isn't orientation already over?  
They live streamed it on YouTube as well
Thats for non b tech students
